title: AirBrush: Easy Photo Editor
description:
Who says we can‚Äôt have perfection in our photos? We believe all users should have the best editor and filter technology at their fingertips, and AirBrush continually updates with new features and effects to stay up to date with editing standards. AirBrush was designed to be the best photo editor with user-friendly retouch tools, cool filter options, and natural, beautiful results!

Features:

Blemish and Pimple Remover
** Say goodbye to pimples and blemishes! With our blemish remover, you can eliminate pimples and unwanted spots with the tap of a finger. Add a swipe of blush to add radiance and charm.

Whiten Teeth and Brighten Eyes
** Whitening your teeth takes your smile to the next level! Our teeth whitening function lets you brighten your smile without over-whitening.
** Our ‚Äúbrighten‚Äù function enhances your eyes to instantly light up your features.

Perfect Skin in Every Photo
** Retouch, edit and even tan your skin to achieve perfect, glowing perfection in just a few swipes! Your skin will look naturally radiant in all of your selfies and photos! For an added bonus, swipe on a cool blush or rouge to give your cheeks an extra glow.

Slim, Reshape and Lengthen Your Selfie or Photo
** Instantly slim, lengthen or reshape any area of your photo with a few swipes of your finger.

Artistic Retouching Features
** In addition its HD editing features, the AirBrush editor also includes tools that let you blur, crop, stretch, slim and tune your pics for an artistic, beautiful and dramatic touch. Choose to automatically retouch your pictures or fix them manually.

Add Depth and Style to Your Photos
** Our ‚ÄúBlur‚Äù editing tool lets you retouch any photos to give it more depth and keep only the things that matter in focus. Your photos and pics will embody the cool perfection seen in professional photography.

Real-Time Editing Technology
** Edit your selfie before taking the picture with real-time editing tools. See your shot on your phone, choose your edits and filters, then snap the photo for a perfect pics every time!

Natural, Radiant Filters
** AirBrush beauty filters were professionally designed to enhance even the best pictures and selfie photos for a perfect, beautiful finishing touch. Some filters can add natural-looking makeup to your pics, like blush or mascara!

Ready to Share?
** This is the editing tool that really gets your picture ready for sharing. When you‚Äôre done editing, share your pics to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Snapchat right from AirBrush!

Follow us on our official accounts and share your selfies, pictures and comments with us!

‚Ä¢ Facebook
‚Ä¢ Twitter
‚Ä¢ Instagram

comments: It went from the best app to the worst. I paid for a subscription and for the last 5 months of my subscription if it's not one thing it's another, now I can't load images to edit and following the troubleshooting doesn't work. Unstilling and reinstalling doesn't work. Such a disappointment and a waste of money. Update 7.30.21 I'm still experiencing the samething. Now even Uninstalling and reinstalling is not working. I have premium and it say says I don't and it just renewed last month.

I have not used app for a couple of months and today when I open up the app, because I really need to blur a face on a photo, for publishing on social media, I can't open my album at all. Not photos, downloads, nothing. In other words an app to remove from your phone since it is a non-working app.

This used to be a great app. No more. Only shows me their dumb model photos. I don't want to make over an ugly model! I want to enhance beautiful me! Bye. I have 3 devices, and it doesn't work on any of them. I click on a photo, and it does nothing. You're too hard, and too much trouble to contact in your app. Uninstalled. Not worth the trouble. Don't you know what version you have?

Paid for the upgrade and I'm glad I did, no issues for me with this app and it's very easy to edit photos without being trained in the dark art of photoshop, the quality you can enhance from a picture on your phone without downloading it to a computer and editing it is phenomenal. Only problem I have is working out what filters are what as you can't tell until you put them on. But that's not a problem with the app.

I used to love this app, but now it doesn't even load my images and keeps freezing. Closing the app and reopening it doesn't work. I will try uninstalling and reinstalling, but I have read that also does not help. I am paying for the premium subscription so I am hoping they fix this issue asap. What a bummer.

description:
If you like Photo Widget style on iOS 14, this app is the best choice for you.

Simple to use home screen widgets style OS14 to display your favorite photos with three layout options and support multiple pages.

Photo Widget OS14 provides you with the ability to display images outside the home screen with the best image quality, extremely battery saving.

Photo Widget OS14 is designed similar to widgets on phone 12. The photo will change automatically after a period of time to help your phone not in use.

title: Face Touchup - Photo Editor
description:
Face Blemish Remover, Pimple Remover, Acne Remover is an excellent app for transforming your face into a PerfectFace.

With the virtual makeover app, you can retouch selfies and improve your appearance.

You can now retouch and tune your photos using our face photo editor, which will provide you with a plethora of tools to help you achieve the perfect selfie in which your skin is perfectly clear, smooth, free of acne, or pimples, red eyes, wrinkles, and dark circles.

Features FaceTouch :-
- Reshape
With a few simple swipes, you can instantly slim and change the shape of any part of your face, whether you want to thin your nose, shape your face, or make your lips bigger. Anything is possible with this app.

- Skin Smoothing
Face tune to experiment with the foundation effect, soften your skin, and achieve a smooth complexion!

- Teeth Whitener
The Makeover Face app easily removes yellow teeth, resulting in a glowing smile with impressive white teeth!

- Remover of Pimples and Blemishes
Tools for advanced editing Patch and Vanish will remove and retouch any pores, scars, or blemishes for a soft, smooth complexion.

- Get the ideal tan for your photos
Using the skin tanning tool, you can achieve a light tan or a dark glowing tan that looks like you spent the day on an exotic island.

If you get Error or Bug, contact us.

comments: Been using this app for years and I love how user friendly it is. I do appreciate how they have added options to create a more personal design. I would like to see stickers and ribbons added for fun. üëç

Loveeee this app omg I recently got my free photo book, it's amazing quality. I only ever used the printed photos app and I ran out of space, then I found out about the photo book app. Whoever came up with this idea, may the universe bless you.

Pretty cool deal. Small free photo book each month n just pay shipping. It's nice that there are options to upgrade it if you want. I've ordered one so far n my 2nd book is on it's way with some upgrades.

Wouldn't recommend this app I had a bad experience I ordered a photo book and then when they gave me a tracking number. Pretty much UPS said there was no package with that tracking number then I connect with freeprint app the person I connect with was rude and would not answer my question and they pretty much just said the tracking number they gave me is not valid. which doesn't make any sense because that's the tracking number they gave me and they wouldn't give me a refund for losing my book
I enjoy making memory books. This app is so easy to use and my family and friends really enjoy the books. They are really wonderful and look so professional.

title: Photo Editor
description: No photo editing skills are required. You can lose weight and face thinner. Beautify your pictures, adjust brightness, contrast, temperature and saturation. Output high-resolution pictures, which can be shared with your friends.
descriptionHTML: No photo editing skills are required. You can lose weight and face thinner. Beautify your pictures, adjust brightness, contrast, temperature and saturation. Output high-resolution pictures, which can be shared with your friends.
summary: An advanced picture editor
comments: First off, it is VERY limited in what it can do. It can give you a "facelift", although I didn't notice any difference, and other body shaping, which I didn't need for my experimental photo. Only the manual option worked. A circle appeared on my face, but I wasn't ever sure it did anything because there were NO INSTRUCTIONS, and there was a line coming out. I wasn't sure if I was supposed to line it up to something or not. There were filters that played with light but that's it.

Now I can't add text without subscribing? So many features now require payment and it really sucks. The added features are cool and all but I got this app because it was free and easy to use. Now, it has none of that and I can't make a decent simple text graphic without having to...

I rely on this app for all my art projects. It works so well that gives so many options that its hard to find anything else like it. I have to admit sometimes it blurs or makes an image look wonky but the benefits outweigh the negatives. It's worth your time to use or check out.

I upgraded to Gold a few days ago. I have been trying to cancel for the last hour before I get charged and it is impossible. It doesn't have an option on the app like it says. It passes you to your Play account. Here it says I have cancelled from this date in 2021.

xcellent variety of features to choose from. Probably one of the best editors out there, with the bonus of sharing and getting to know the works of others in a like-minded community. The only recommendations I would make would be more offline availability for feature use in both editing

title: PhotoRoom - Background Eraser & Photo Editor
description:
PhotoRoom is the all-in-one app that edits, designs and optimizes great visual content that helps you run your business from your phone. Remove or erase the background of photos, use templates and create your own content. 

No need to be a photographer or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your photos into pro-quality content in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates to make it even easier. It's like having a whole photography and design studio in your pocket!


More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Official photos for your Passport, ID or Driver‚Äôs License
- Covers for Youtube, Instagram and Facebook
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc. 

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Make your own stickers in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, etc, you can optimize your business with features like the AI background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership. 

PhotoRoom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you‚Äôre looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original PhotoRoom.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote you and your business on social by easily creating templates for Youtube or Podcast covers, and Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest content.

PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom logo
- Access to 3 Pro cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to the full Pro backdrop & template library
- Export at higher resolutions
- Edit and export in batch mode
- Try PhotoRoom Pro with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

Love PhotoRoom?
Follow us on Instagram @photoroom for illustrations and design tips.
Send your feedback to hello@photoroom.com
With PhotoRoom, you will enjoy the most accurate background eraser. In a few taps, you will add a white background to your pictures, have a perfect pixelcut, or have access to multiple photo editing options.

developer: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App
comments: I'm an online seller, so when I found out about this app I thought to myself, "this is going to save me a ton of time". First photo I uploaded was anklet. The app is supposed to remove the background so you can add a nice backdrop. You can't adjust how much of the original background is removed so you see bits of the original background on the new backdrop. It looks super janky. Waste of time. I'd rather do it myself by hand, looks more professional.

Love the app, however it keeps messing up my phone. I have a phone for just taking photo's for my business, so I don't have many apps on my phone. After I downloaded the app my phone started acting up. I had to factory reset my phone and downloaded the app again. It starts off great, but then after several uses it messes my phone up. Needless to say my phone is messing up again. So unfortunately I have to delete the app. I really do love the way my photo's turn out though.

This app would be ideal if it wouldn't cut off one hand or leave a small trash can, if it would've cut out BOTH hands/arms it would have been ok but it only took one of them, and it would NOT release the small trash can, it wasn't attached to the main part of the photo so I'm not sure why it kept doing it.

Trying to erase the background. The line keeps scrolling back and forth over the photo but never erases the background . I have trying stopping and restarting the app. I removed and reinstalled the app didn't help. Also why does parts of the photo show up almost "ghosted". I either fully remove or add the area, depending. Also if trying to remove a small area it's difficult to see. The zoom window is worthless, just gets in the way.

Very helpful app but not perfect. There were times that you surprise me with the result and then 3 out of 5 times I was wondering what the hell why you were not able to remove this and that? So please improve for the better.

title: 15 August Photo Editor
description:
‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ Application Title:  15 August Photo Editor ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

15 August Photo Editor are more beautiful and attractive.
Now we develop 15 August photo frame effects app to decorate your photos with 15 August photo frame editor and to get feel we are in Pleasant atmosphere.

*:=:*:=:*:=:*:=:*:  How to Use Application Step By Step *:=:*:=:*:=:*:=:*:
Crop Option
Take photo or selfie or select gallery photo. It has crop option. Crop the photo first with the help of crop feature to remove unwanted portion from it.
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Erase Background -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
15 August photo editor has background erase option. It helps you to remove background of your photos. Eraser size can be adjusted. Make its size small or big. Use Zoom in & zoom out option to erase carefully without erasing the main picture.
Undo, redo and Repair option will help you to correct the mistakes while erasing and erase the background perfectly.
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Cut-::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
15 August photo editor has cut option. Directly cut the desired image out from the unwanted background with the help of cut tool and paste it on any background.
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Auto Eraser -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
This photo editor has auto background eraser. It will help you to remove particular pixels from the background in single touch.
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Manual Erase -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
For finger rub (traditional) background removal
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Lasso Erase-::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
For area selection background erase


‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- None background or single color background -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
You can set none background or any single color background in this app with this option. Your photo will get white background with none background option. If you don‚Äôt like white background, select any single color to set as background color.

‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Change Background -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
After you delete or remove background, you can choose an image from your gallery to add as background.. Drag it to right position, zoom in or zoom out and set it. Also convert it to blur background.

‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Set wallpaper -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
The Final image which you got in this app can be set as a wallpaper of your device.

‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Flip option -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
It has flip option and it can be applied to your main photo and stickers. Sometimes the real picture‚Äôs pose may not be attractive. By changing the pose to opposite direction the picture may be more attractive. Flip option will help you to do it.
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Add stickers -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
15 August photo editor has 20+ stickers. Add photo stickers from the sticker collections. Select any sticker drag it to right position, zoom in or zoom out, rotate it, flip it and set it at the suitable position on the photo. You can reduce the opacity of stickers and photos also.
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Add Text -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
This app has text option. Add quote or text as per your choice on the photo. Also it can be used to send good morning, good night messages, festival wishes, greetings etc.

‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Stickers list -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ
Emoji, Butterfly, plants, birds and smiley images
‚òÖ‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶-::- Share option -::-‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚ú¶‚òÖ

title: Chatbooks - Print Monthly Photo Books
description:
Get your photos off your phone and into your hands with the Chatbooks app! It‚Äôs never been easier to print all your family photos into a collection of beautiful photo books. 
Our bestselling 5x7‚Äù Monthbooks are designed to show off the everyday photos you take on your phone. Start a Monthbooks subscription to get a new 30-page photo book every month. Add photos right from your phone camera roll in the Chatbooks app, edit, and send to print in just a few taps. Cancel anytime and always get free shipping on any Chatbooks photo book subscription. 
Chatbooks photo books offer softcover or hardcover options, a range of sizes from 6x6‚Äù to 10x10‚Äù, and several chic spine and cover colors and designs. Add a contributor for a photo book that includes everyone‚Äôs photos that your whole family will love. Photo books make swoon-worthy personalized decor: start a collection today to style the ultimate shelfie. Plus, free shipping options are available on all products in the U.S.! 
It‚Äôs seriously beyond easy to create Chatbooks. Buzzfeed says: ‚ÄúYou can have a beautiful book in minutes.‚Äù Millions of Chatbookers use the Chatbooks app to print their photos‚Äîjoin them!
descriptionHTML:
Get your photos off your phone and into your hands with the Chatbooks app! It‚Äôs never been easier to print all your family photos into a collection of beautiful photo books.
Our bestselling 5x7‚Äù Monthbooks are designed to show off the everyday photos you take on your phone. Start a Monthbooks subscription to get a new 30-page photo book every month. summary: Ridiculously Easy Photo Books
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: The service of chat books itself is amazing and such a great deal, however the app itself is so glitchy. I've had multiple times where I couldn't get all of my photos to work , one time it wouldn't send to print without talking to customer service a bunch, I've had the app freeze and crash a ton. If I ever put the wrong photo and want to switch it, it won't ever let me, it's very frustrating sometimes. I wish they'd make the app run better and then it would be an amazing service overall

I would use this if the app if it was not so buggy. Selecting photo from your gallery is not an option, you must navigate photos using their app and it is NOT user-friendly. Adding photos to an existing book was also a challenge as the add photos button would not always appear. Love the idea but the app just ruined the experience.

I really enjoy this app in general. The idea behind it, layout, and simplicity are all really great. However, it still needs a lot of work with the glitching issues. My progress would get halted fairly often by the app simply stopping allowing me to edit anymore, and at checkout it would not let me select PayPal as a payment method. If you could get these types of glitches resolved I would really love using it!

I want to love this app so bad but it won't work for me at all. It is struggling to upload pictures and won't rotate them at all. I don't have days to devote to making one tiny book. Work on your app and I'll be a customer for a long time.
The only negative...is that it won't read in photos from all folders. I had to resort to screen shots to get photos off cloud or messenger for example

comments: Very cool. There are two annoying features. One, the Disney effect includes an inset of the original picture. This limits it's usefulness if just the effect is wanted. It also the in the way of animation effects. At least, provide the option of removing it. Two, the basic effects should be clearly displayed and denoted at the beginning of the all effects before the variations and examples are displayed.

Tried it simply for my own amusement. Everything is perfect for a bit of goofing off, especially if you enjoy laughing at yourself. Even better for those of us that don't like having pictures taken of themselves. (I had to actually take a picture of myself in order to see what I would look like in those filters, I'm a no-pictures person.). ‚ù§Ô∏è Ads are extremely minimal.

After trying this app a second time, it was a lot of fun. A lot of cool filters. The app had some issues with crashing but it seems likes it's normalized. Works best with unedited photos and you can add layers of filters on one picture, which was very cool. nice effects. i do recommend.

The game is nice.....infact for anything unique it us a nice game to toon urself into something new and trendy but a problem here is that there are so many ads and the effects I choose are not the real effects that are shown in the picture , I tried several times but the effects were not the true effects that were shown in the pictures , if possible kindly fix these 2 issues otherwise 3 stars...but a huge request to fix those issues....

The app is cool, the filters are amazing. However when it comes to Disney filter, it's cute and amazing but it's not that fun to use because you'll have a big circle with your face in it on the side of the filter, and that destroys the fun. I hope they'll remove that.

Independence Day, one of the three national holidays in India (the other two being the Republic Day on 26 January and Mahatma Gandhi's birthday on 2 October), is observed in all Indian states and union territories. On the eve of Independence Day, the President of India delivers the 'Address to the Nation'. On 15 August, the prime minister hoists the Indian flag on the ramparts of the historical site Red Fort in Delhi.

Republic Day honors the date on which the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950 replacing the Government of India Act (1935) as the governing document of India.

recentChanges: We are focused on improving the app for you. Please feel free to reach out to us at support@groovebook.com with any questions, suggestions or concerns.
comments: I've used Groovebook for a few years now. They used to be really great pictures, and now the pictures are terrible! You can't go back to see the pictures you've selected either! I had my 100 pictures ready to go, but forgot to add money to my prepaid card.. That was two months ago. I made the mistake of putting my bank card, I was charged, but never received any pictures. After a few years of ordering, I will be cancelling my subscription.

This was a good app to get 100 pictures for 5.27 but the quality of the pictures could be better & they can be printed all the way & not cut off the heads of some of my grandbabies. My husband keeps telling me you get what you paid for. Then to top it all off I try to upload my pictures to the next printable month & it is giving me a very hard time. Im about to cancel my subscription tbh. I can get shuttle bug from what I've been told & it is supposed to be better. Please fix these issues thanks

I love the idea of groovebook and how many pictures you can get a month but the picture paper quality wasnt good. Super thin like its actually on paper but with a little gloss to it. Also almost all 100 of my pictures were cut off on one side and the other side had a different picture, almost as if they weren't cut straight.

Half the time the app won't open and keep stopping. I have not filled my book for the month but it doesn't allow me to go in and add any photos. I spend at least 30 minutes every time I'm trying to put more photos in my album just trying to figure out where I'm supposed to go to do that. Then other times it'll work perfectly. Very frustrating

Groovebook use to be amazing! But in the last few months it won't access any of my recent photos--- from any of my albums. I contacted customer care regarding this and it's been over a week without a reply. I am canceling my subscription after YEARS of having it and going to a competitor.

comments: Everything was good until I put in my third pic. Now it's wanting all my information to charge me for next week. This is very annoying. I thought this was a free app at first, I wouldn't have loaded if I knew it was gonna charge me even weekly. It gets a 2.

Okay this app isn't all bad! It may be glitchy at multiple times along with several adds, but it works! The age filter is crazy! This app just needs a little... shaping. Otherwise its good! Just want to do a video.

Another scam app that shoves ads all over social media claiming to be free only to do everything it can to make you pay membership fees the very minute you open the damn thing. I refused to hand over payment info as I knew after the 3 day trial (3 days...pathetic) it'd probably prevent me from cancelling until I hand over my first payment. The fact that these apps are allowed on the app store despite such false advertising is a joke. Sick of it.

You upload a pic and then you have to give a review in order to see what the results are or pay $8.99. So here's my review based on everything I've been able to use. You can upload a pic. REVIEW DONE! Let someone see the finished product before they go online and write a review. Since you don't do that my review is the app sucks. The developers obviously don't have any logic, brains or common sense or they would let you use the app before making you review it. You cant fix stupid!

I just signed up for this app. I have a 3 day free trial after which it'd $19.99 per month. 10 minutes after all of this, the app has locked my images requiring me to pay $9.99 for a weekly membership. Before this, I was ordered to rate the app in order to unlock an image. Mind you, all of this occured in TEN MINUTES after signing up for a monthly membership.

comments: DUDE!!!!! This is by far the absolute best app for photo editing. Most features are already pre-set so it makes it really easy to edit photos and look ANAZING in no time. It also saves right into your Google photos and let's you re post. The only bad thing is the price. At $30 ill probably be back to my old face in no time as soon as my trial ends. üò≠üò©

Great app! Clean and simple design. Gives amazing visual results which often look very natural. Had some good laughs at some filters. Freely available filters are good enough to try out the app, but the subscription model does not work for people that just want to make one good looking profile picture of themselves from time to time. I especially like their solution for temporary cloud storage. The images are encrypted using a key stored on the device only. Definitely worth a try! üòÄ

Generally I think this is a cool app and it definitely does what it's supposed to do. I do have two issues with it. 1. Sometimes the AI gets the gender wrong. Sometimes there's an option to correct it, but for me it's only available when it recognizes a woman as a man. If it mistakenly thinks a man is a woman, I just have to deal with that. 2. There used to be an option to use certain filters by watching an ad. This has been removed and now you have to buy the full version for that, which sucks.

It's really interesting to see what kind of makeup I like to recreate on here. All the filters are so flawless and cool looking especially the gender swap ones. The only thing is when you try the hair filters it seems to mess with the face a bit and give you makeup for long hair for some reason. Other than that it's awesome!

It's just a unique game.  while exercising your attention, sharpening your visual acuity, it improves your concentration.  This game is too much fun and quite entertaining.  The action framed by an adequate graphic layout.  A particularly flexible environment, structured to generate matches, tournaments, etc.  In fact the competition is stimulating and rather intense.  A fanned flame, shaped by the presence of online opponents, who are there to get all the differences before you do.

title: FilmBox Film Negatives Scanner
description:
Brought to you by the developer that built the smartest photo scanner app, Photomyne is proud to now offer an AI-powered negative film scanner app that will blow you away. See how those hidden negative memories are instantly revealed, scanned and saved!

IT‚ÄôS AUTOMATIC - JUST ADD CAMERA FILM NEGATIVES:
1. Open a backlight source on your computer (or use the link provided in the app)
2. Hold the film strip vertically in front of the light
3. Long-press the capture button
4. See negatives magically scanned and images revealed

The app‚Äôs scanning algorithm automatically inverts colors and enhances the image so you get the best possible scans of your old film negatives.

CELEBRATE YOUR NEWLY SCANNED FILM NEGATIVES:
* Save the new digital photos to your phone
* Share your photos and collages with the people you love

OPTIONAL IN-APP UPGRADE:
The first few photos are free. For unlimited use, consider purchasing an optional paid plan (in-app purchase). 
Here are the premium features you get with a paid plan:
* Unlimited scanning
* Unlimited photo saving and sharing

The app offers an optional paid plan via monthly/yearly auto-renewing subscriptions**, as well as a One-Time plan which is paid for by a single upfront payment (valid for 2 years). These offer unlimited access to the premium mentioned above.

Got any questions? We‚Äôd love to connect: support@photomyne.com

2. Hold the film strip vertically in front of the light
3. Long-press the capture button
4. See negatives magically scanned and images revealed

The app‚Äôs scanning algorithm automatically inverts colors and enhances the image so you get the best possible scans of your old film negatives.

CELEBRATE YOUR NEWLY SCANNED FILM NEGATIVES:
* Save the new digital photos to your phone
* Share your photos and collages with the people you love

OPTIONAL IN-APP UPGRADE:
The first few photos are free. For unlimited use, consider purchasing an optional paid plan (in-app purchase).
Here are the premium features you get with a paid plan:
* Unlimited scanning
* Unlimited photo saving and sharing

The app offers an optional paid plan via monthly/yearly auto-renewing subscriptions**, as well as a One-Time plan which is paid for by a single upfront payment (valid for 2 years). These offer unlimited access to the premium mentioned above.

Got any questions? We‚Äôd love to connect: support@photomyne.com
Privacy Policy: https://photomyne.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://photomyne.com/terms-of-use

title: ProxyPics
description:
ProxyPics is the first-of-its-kind on-demand system for getting the location-specific pictures you need from wherever you are.

Our simple-to-use app features an online marketplace, matching users needing location-based photos with local users, ready to take snapshots. Never before has it been quicker, cheaper, or simpler to get timely images from anywhere around the world. 

NEED A PHOTO OF A SPECIFIC LOCATION, ASAP?
Enter an address, a few details about the job, and submit. Your order is instantly posted to users at the location. Within minutes, you‚Äôll receive a photo taken just for you. Pay the low one-time fee and save the photo to your camera roll.

WANT TO TAKE PHOTOS AND EARN EXTRA CASH?
ProxyPics will notify you when photo assignments are available near your current location. Accept any nearby jobs, take the pic, submit, and get paid! Work whenever it‚Äôs convenient for you, wherever you are.

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Built-in map makes posting jobs easy and accurate.
‚Ä¢ GPS and notifications alert you to nearby jobs, wherever you are.
‚Ä¢ Online payments ensure fast delivery of funds.
‚Ä¢ Fixed pricing finally makes on-the-spot photography super affordable.

USES
‚Ä¢ Need a photo of a house for real estate purposes? ProxyPics users can provide the latest peek at a property.
‚Ä¢ Want to know how long the line is for that new phone release? Let ProxyPics show you if it‚Äôs worth getting out of bed for?
‚Ä¢ Teaching a class about Roman architecture? Can‚Äôt find a decent photo of that perfect arch? Have a local send you the precise picture from across an ocean.
‚Ä¢ And more! The possibilities are endless. If you can point to it on a map, you can have an up-to-date photo in minutes.

We are actively working on new features and improvements to bring you a better experience.

comments: Easy money! While there are not very many orders in my area, that's my only complaint. The orders I do receive are easy to complete and pay well. The ProxyPics staff are very available and helpful. The app works well, and the cashouts are flawless. Hopefully they continue to gain business in my area as I look forward to accepting more orders soon!

I do enjoy these jobs and love the app! However, I won't be accepting anymore assignments that reference coordinates only, it seldom works out! Always ask for a physical address before accepting assignment. They usually have one even though initially the longitude and latitude are only entered. As for the updates, I get messages indicating an update, so I select the "Take Me There" option but the app just shows Uninstall or Open. Select open and it will come back with the Update option.

I just wasted 30 minutes trying to sign up. I entered all my info and password then when asked to sign in it says invalid password. So I request to set up a new password. I get the email link try several new passwords and all are denied. Then I decided to try the suggested password and it's denied also. I'm beginning to think this app is just a scam to collect my personal information.

Worked fine until I got a notification of an update. When I went to Google play I saw no update, but there were 2 tabs, one to uninstall, and the other to open. When I tried to click on "open" the tab did nothing.

App Never Updates... it tells me there's an update, so I update it. Then when I open the app after updating it, it still tells me an update is available, then asks, "Take You There?" ... Fix it so I can get to work!!

Do you want your Instagram account to be popular or commercially successful? Then each ig story and post in your account should look amazing. How to achieve that? To use story templates and themes from the instagram story collage maker Instories. But this stories edit app is not just a collection of Instagram themes and pic collages: this story builder will help you create videos that will look thoroughly professional ‚Äï with stylish and intricate fonts, exciting animations, amazing video effects, music and so on.

Top 8 reasons to choose Instories video collage maker with music:

title: Rumble Camera - Make Money With Your Videos
description:
Rumble Camera allows you to make money with videos that you film with your phones camera. In today's world, video creators are being taken advantage of; social media platforms don't pay what you deserve, you lack visibility, transparency, and there are no good tools that allow you to control distribution. Rumble's camera app does all this for you.

FEATURES on our camera app:
- Film your videos from the Rumble camera app
- Upload, store and host your videos for free (in Rumble's cloud storage).
- Get full transparency and control on where your video is being distributed and how its monetized.
- Make money on videos you thought you never had any value.
- Sync all videos from your phone to the Rumble Camera app.
- Ability to cash out straight from the camera app.

FEATURES on web (accessible on Rumble.com):
- Full data analytics. See exactly what websites used your videos and how much you made.
- White-lists & Blacklists. You can stop any website at anytime from using your content.
- Ability to create as many channels as you like.
- Ability to subscribe to channels.

Rumble's camera will strive to be the place where you earn the maximum amount of money for the videos you create. The Rumble Camera app is free and works on most devices.

You've got four different color options to find the object with contrast photo shooting and video recording for night philter effects. Just select several pictures, Photo Collage Maker & Editor instantly remix them into cool photo collage. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, text and much more. Unleash your creativity in our photo lab! It‚Äôs completely free!

Features:
‚óè Combine up to 18 photos to create pic collage.
‚óè 100+ Layouts of frames or grids to choose from!
‚óè Large number of Background, Sticker, Font, and doodle to choose from!
‚óè Change ratio of collage and edit border of collage.
‚óè Make photo collage with Free style or Grid style.
‚óè Crop pictures and edit photo with Filter, Text.
‚óè Insta square photo with blur background for Instagram.
‚óè Save photo in high resolution and share pictures to social apps.


üì∑ Grid
Create photo collage with hundreds of layouts in seconds. Custom photo grid size, border and background, you can design layout on your own! So easy to make a beautiful photo collage.

üì∑ Edit
All-in-one photo editor provides a bunch of editing tools: crop picture, apply filter to picture, add sticker and text to image, draw on image with doodle tool, flip, rotate...

üì∑ Freestyle
Select beautiful background with full screen ratio to create a scrapbook. You can decorate with pictures, stickers, texts, doodles, and share your scrapbook to Instagram Stories and Snapchat Stories.

üì∑ Story Template
100+ Stylized templates including Film, Magazine, Ripped Paper‚Ä¶ Have fun with this Insta story maker, share your most memorable moments with friends.

üì∑ Multi-fit
Insta square photo in a blur background or white to fit for Instagram. You can choose multiple ratios, 1:1, 4:5, 3:2 ratios, etc. Easily post entire photo with no crop. You can even square up to 10 photos at one time.

About our permissions:
Collage Maker asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos/videos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

Collage Maker is the best photo collage maker, pic stitch and photo editor for Instagram and printing. If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: photostudio.feedback@gmail.com

comments: So I decided to down load this to make my own wallpapers, I was kinda disappointed where you had to buy a lot of the things. There is like a subscription. (Not a one time payment.) I am easily able to make my own wallpapers though which is nice. There are no pop up ads. But even though there is a subscription for a lot of stuff, there are still ads that you have to watch for other things. Like, what? They are trying to rack in the money. I wouldn't recommend doing the subscription. Not worth it.

I'm sorry, I don't see how this app has 4.9 stars. I couldn't use it because at the slightest touch of a photo, it would go crooked. I spent 20 minutes trying keep the 4 photos in my collage straight because anytime I tried adjusting their size, they would also go crooked. PLEASE add an option to choose to keep photos straight. Also, not to sound callous but most of the templates are so poorly designed, it's as if there was no planning or thought process put into them but just thrown together

Just got it by accident (I thought it was one I'd previously used), and have only used it for one collage but so far I LOVE IT! I have a lot of photo (and video) editing apps/software and was just looking to combine 2pics for Instagram bc they don't make creativity outside of their 1:1 boxüòâ very easy; it not only does that but (from the looks of it) a whole lot more, and in a really easy way! I don't often do "I just got this" reviews - only when I'm very pleasantly surprised. Which I am!

Haven't used it long yet, but so far it's easy with a lot of options. Would love a wider range of fonts, but the design possibilities for altering the fonts (such as borders, backgrounds, shadows, etc) are great! Ad system isn't a problem so far on the free version. 5/5

Very good app I like it, but may be you can more improve it so we can choose our own wallpaper from our gallery. But it still good to me because it can help me make my homework like art, poster and make some digital college.Anyway it still very useful and easy. Thanks

title: Inmate Photos, Send Photo Prints to Jail
description:
Remind your incarcerated friend or loved one that they are not forgotten by sending photos to them when they are in jail, a corrections institution, or a BOP or state prison. Ordering photos within our app is easy and takes just a few minutes.

It is very easy to use our app: 
* Sign up using your email address, Google, Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter account
* Specify the inmate you intend to send photos to by entering their federal BOP register number or by selecting the state, facility, and ID number for the jail they are at
* Read and understand the rules of the jail or prison that you selected 
* Upload photos from your device, Facebook, Google, or Instagram 
* Add a personalized message 
* Confirm your address, so the facility knows where to send any photos that violate their rules to
* Place your order

While we do not send cards, videos, organize visits, or transfer money, our focus is to make sending pictures easy and affordable. 

While Securus, Corrlinks, and jPay print photos in black and white ink on plain copy paper, Inmate Photos will connect the inmate with a high-quality professional print in full-color. Freeprints services charge up to $9.99 for shipping. Our shipping charge is never more than $4.50. 

All inmates receive a mugshot when they arrive at a facility, but that is the only photo they will receive outside of a civilian sending them photos.

Pictures sent by you can cheer up the people in your network of friends and loved ones who are at a low point in their life. Being a pen-pal and sending photos can really help put an inmate in a better state of mind and remind them that you care. 

The United States houses 2.2 million inmates, which is 25% of the world‚Äôs incarcerated population. We are a service for imprisoned people, their friends, and their relatives. 

Prisons have rules and regulations about delivering physical items to the inmates. We help you comply with those rules and ensure that the photos get delivered to the inmate.
We currently service all federal facilities and are constantly adding state prisons and county and city jails.

title: Remini - Photo Enhancer
description:
Remini makes old, blurred or low quality photos taken with old cameras or mobile phones to high-definition and clarity.

Remini engages state-of-art AI generative technology to bring professional film production level image enhancing and restoration technologies to our daily life. 

Since Remini launched in the beginning of 2019, more than tens of millions photos ‚Äì low resolution, blurred, compressed and damaged ‚Äì have been enhanced.

-------- Amazing features ----------------
‚Ä¢ Remini can enhance old photos and low quality photos to high-definition.
‚Ä¢ Remini can enhance photos taken with old cameras or mobile phones to like with up-to-date cameras or mobile phones.
‚Ä¢ Remini can repair blurred photos to clarity.
‚Ä¢ Remini is capable of repairing blurred videos, allowing you to play back previously captured videos with a clear picture on a larger display device.
‚Ä¢ Remini also provides more AI-related image processing functions, waiting for you to discover.

recentChanges: Hello Remini Users, It's a great day to try our Enhance feature! We just fixed a little bug that improves the overall performance. Cheers The Remini Team
comments: HELLO! This app is actually good and I never review things so that must mean something. The enhancements it did to some of my pictures was very surprising. My original images would be super grainy and blurry but this app would make it to where I could literally see individual hairs of people's mustaches, eyebrows, and eyelashes, not to mention the great amount of detail that came out of eyes. No idea how the app is able to do this. Seriously just try it out on a grainy picture of someone's face

It's still not working. Everytime I try to enhance a photo, it says "Network Request Timeout (0)" and it wont let me do anything. I tried to reinstall it, but then I could not even sign in to my account because of this error. I hope you guys fix this FAST. I will change my review to 5 stars after the app is fixed because this was the BEST photo enhancer that I am using.. well I "was" using.

I can actually see my great-grandfather instead of a blurry old photo. I wish it could enhance the rest of the photo, not just the face. The color feature needs a lot of improvement. It just turns sections of the picture orange and that's it. Also, I wish there was a no eyelashes option. It keeps giving people thick full eyelashes where there aren't any.

At first I loved using it. But as the days pass by, Everytime I tried to enhance some photos I couldn't because it always says network timeout. Really? I have a stable network connection and then it'll always says network timeout? Please fix this problem so that everyone can enjoy the best quality. Personally I loved it. It's just this thing happen that's why I rate only one star.

At first I enjoyed this app because literally it's amazing!! But suddenly NETWORK ERROR pops out, so I try to update but still doesn't work. I hope you guys fix this issue. But if this issue has been fixed, I can guarantee that this app is worth it!!

title: Expose: Photo Editing w/ Live Background & Overlay
description:
Boost your pictures with animated glitch effects and moving filters! Whether you shot a portrait of your friend, or did a quick selfie in the mirror, our moving effects and live background animations will elevate your photos! It's super easy: add your image, pick a filter, and share your masterpiece. Improving your social media game was never this easy! Our quick photo editor will do the heavy lifting for you: our AI will automatically select the foreground, no need for manual masking. You can choose presets in different categories, like Glitch, Lights, Cyberpunk, Drip Art, and Live Background. Select the filter that best fits your photo's mood. You can fine-tune the details of the filters and effects to get perfect posts and stories for TikTok, Instagram, or WhatsApp.
We have an effect and background for every occasion. You can express your love for a film or series with our overlays, share your interest in a cyberpunk style future or simply add a retro effect to an otherwise simple picture!
Your photos + our photo editing app will leave your followers speechless! 
We all love short videos. However, some precious moments can't be expressed with them. This is why we created Expose: it helps you say everything with just  a photo and a matchy effect to create mind-blowing videos of them. Expose your creative side and make something artistic.

This is the new photo editor app from the VIMAGE team. It's like VIMAGE app for lazies: neon effects, contemporary filters, and groovy templates, right at your fingertips.

Here are the filters you can choose from:
LIVE BACKGROUND
GLITCH

OVERLAYS
LIGHTS
CYBERPUNK

This list is not exhaustive; come and discover the features within the app!

We're sure the creations made with Expose are the ones you want to show your family, friends, followers, everyone, they will love them!

Expose is free to use, in-app purchases are available. Become a PRO user to get access to all features now, and even more in the future.

PRO features* include effects like Film, Split, Gradient and many more. 


For tech support or any questions or suggestions, email us: expose@vimageapp.com

title: Photo editor: Travel anywhere
description:
Highlighting your photos with Photo editor: Travel anywhere App is easier than ever. This application helps you to photo collage travel everywhere and make all your cherished travel plans with lovely and inspirational photos.

With Photo editor: Travel anywhere application, you can enhance your photos of travel moments with world-famous tourist and sightseeing landmarks to make the photo more unique. You can edit your images with different views of a place and nature, and turn your photos into real works of art.

Main features:

- Change the frame with +9999 famous landmarks in the world for virtual photo collage
- Photo editing effects toolkit
- Edit colors, clouds and change the sky background
- Text & sticker adder will change the image to more attractive
- Automatic photo filters
- Create travel photos and stitch them into a story
- You can Rotate, scale, zoom in, zoom out or drag the photo to fit the frame as you like
- You can save and share your photo via social network

User manual app Photo editor: Travel anywhere

Step 1: Install Photo editor: Travel anywhere
Step 2: Open the application and follow the instructions of the application
Step 3: Select photos from Mobile Gallery or take new ones
Step 4: Apply your favorite Effect on the photo of your choice
Step 5: Choose the place you want to visit  and collage photo
Tip: Choose a photo of yourself, the background is not many people, the photo is not too bright to create a photo of the best moment.
Step 6: Apply many filters, text styles & cute stickers to it
Step 7: Click Save image with two options
- Save photo and share to friends, social networks.
- Or continue to edit photos

Please use Photo Editor: Travel Anywhere regularly and let us know your recommendations about the app at kangbongfaseri@gmail.com.
You are always welcome, download the app and enjoy!

title: Runaway Aurora Video Effect & Filter Photo Editor
description:
Runaway aurora effect is the most popular filter recently on all social media, runaway aurora filter app allows you to apply the runway effect in your photo easily without any other app, with just one click you can apply the popular filter runaway aurora in your photo.

With the runaway aurora effect app you can make your photo more aesthetic and vaporwave, our app provides a lot of aesthetic backgrounds such as the sunset, the pink sunset, and aurora backgrounds also you will find a big collection of high-quality runaway aurora backgrounds listed in the app, without forgetting the ability to add your own background.

Runaway aurora effect app is a full and powerful runaway aurora effect video maker with song and animations, runaway aurora filter app provides a lot of animation and transitions to animate your video as you like, you can even add your favorite song.

Runaway aurora effect video maker app is your best choice if you want to edit your photo and make a video from it, with simple and easy steps, our app allows you to apply the popular runaway aurora filter to your photo.

Features :

* Automatically background removal, the runaway aurora filter app provides the ability to remove the background from any photo automatically, thanks to our ia that can help you to automatically detect and remove the unwanted background.

* Manually background removal, with our app you always remove the background manually if you don't satisfy with automatically background removal result, with few clicks here and there, you can remove your background from your photo easily.

* Big collection of high-quality backgrounds, runaway aurora provides a big collection of hd aurora backgrounds you can choose whatever you like.

* Save images or videos with one click you can save your edited image quickly.

* Save your photo as a video, our app provide the ability to apply the runaway aurora effect video.

* Capture photo from camera, the runaway aurora video filter app allows you to take a picture from your camera and applying the runaway aurora filter instantly

How to use :

* Firstly first, select your photo.
* Automatically background removal will remove the background for you in just 1 second.
* If you are satisfied with the result, click on the checkmark icon in the top right corner, otherwise you can always use the manual background removal option.
* After that, select your favorite background.
* Click on the save icon to save your edited picture to your gallery.
* If you want to make a runaway aurora effect video, just click on the song icon, then the runaway aurora app will generate an aesthetic video for you, you can select your favorite animation or transitions to apply it to your runaway aurora effect video.

comments: Yes, a very good amount of control available. But it seems to consistently overexpose highlights. And there are many resolutions to choose from, but many times it's the ratio that matters more (or as much). With so many options for resolution, it's hard to quickly see what ratio these are without first waiting for the camera to switch over. Thanks all the same for a great app.

1. This camera app has a terrible focusing problem. I have lost many nice shots because of this. You will find out the hard way when you get home to review your pictures taken during the day. 2. I like the option of taking several pictures automatically at the same time

I downloaded it because my Android camera takes terrible pictures and I can NEVER get it to focus. Any words in the pictures are blurred. This camera app works great so far. The photos are good quality and it focuses very, very well!

The auto feature under any option doesn't work! Start with the exposure compensation, Auto is selected but does not work, have to manually move the slider. Then White balance Auto mode does not work, then photo mode Auto does not work! If I had to do everything manually, then samsung's default camera app does much better job than this! Hmphhh...

Very snappy camera app that I've chosen to use instead of the default camera on my Samsung A52 5G, which tends to lag a lot. I am grateful this is even an option because the default camera was very frustrating to deal with. Plus this has a some cool features to it and a lot of customization options.

title: GuruShots - Photography Game
description:
Love taking photos? Join daily photo challenges, get instant feedback, improve your photography & get rewarded. Join for Free!

Team up and take on challenges together! Join a team or create your own, Participate in Team vs Team matches, chat with other members, and see track your Team score in real-time. GuruShots, The first-of-its-kind photo app for photographers of all levels, reinvents the way people interact with their photos, making it more fun, exciting and rewarding.

+ It‚Äôs fun, social and helps improve photography skills.
+ Enjoy daily themed photo challenges.
+ Get Instant Feedback on your pictures from over 6 billion Monthly Votes.
+ See how you rank compared to others in Real-time.
+ Win amazing prizes; Over $800K in prizes.
+ Gain massive exposure: Get featured in magazines, online and in international photo exhibitions!
+ FREE to join & easy to get started.

Ready to show off your creative images? Download our photo app now and join a community of millions around the world who are already hooked!

NEW PHOTO CHALLENGES EVERY DAY
Whether you like taking photos with a DSLR camera or your Mobile phone, share photos in our themed photo competitions, from ‚ÄúBlack and White‚Äù to ‚ÄúBeards‚Äù, capture fresh pictures or dust off shots you already have.

INSTANT FEEDBACK
With instant photos feedback from over 6 billion monthly votes, GuruShots photographers gain affirmation and inspiration on their photography that even surprises themselves with their creativity and progress.

REAL-TIME RANKING
The power of the crowd rates pictures instantly; our photography app enables members to see which photos rank highest, compare their photographs to others, and follow their ranking in real-time.

HAVE AMAZING FUN WITH YOUR PHOTOS
Get ready for the most exciting photography app! Compete in daily photo challenges and work your way up from Newbie to Guru status by receiving peer votes, points, and achievements.
Swap your photographs to see which one works best; use Boosts, Fills and Keys to receive maximum exposure.

IMPROVE YOUR PHOTOGRAPHY SKILLS
Experiment with your photos and find out which of them are WOW. 
Discover what's popular, get fresh ideas and receive awesome insights. As you level up in the photo game, you will find yourself improving your photography skills, too.

MAKE YOUR PHOTOS MORE MEANINGFUL
Gain massive exposure for your photos and earn badges that demonstrate your achievements. Get meaningful recognition and appreciation for your creative photography by being featured in magazines and online - and even in international photo exhibitions!

APPEAR IN AN INTERNATIONAL PHOTO EXHIBITIONS
From New York to Singapore, London to Cape Town, and beyond. About 5,000 GuruShots photographers are recognized each month, with tens of thousands already exhibited. Now, you have the opportunity to get recognized, submit your photos to one of our photo contests for the chance to showcase your work in international photo exhibitions and connect with like-minded photographers.

WIN AMAZING PRIZES
Top GuruShots community members have the chance to snag prizes, from in-game power-ups to photography gear and gift cards. Members cast over 5 billion monthly votes in 500+ photo contests, winning $600k+ in prizes.

Tap into a fast-growing community of millions of creative people like you who simply love taking pictures!

ANYONE CAN JOIN
Suitable for anyone who's passionate about photography at any level from Mobile Photographers to DSLR Photographers.

Download the World‚Äôs #1 photography app now and play for FREE!

recentChanges: New flow for end of Challenges: Instead of popups we have created a new page with previously ended Challenges and their information.
comments: When I joined I was super excited it going to masses like a similar app. But it has the masses. It's confusing all around., from uploading to contests. Awards and prizes are confusing, did I or didn't receive a prize or an award. It's killing my enthusiasm to share my photos. Thanks for sharing your creativity. It's expensive, there's only one option not monthly. And upgrades aren't just 5.99. You pay the whole year so it comes out to almost 100 bucks. This is my last membership this year.

Fun game, but it has bern glitching a lot lately. Just finished a teammates and wasn't showing my votes on the last pic in the match. Points showed in the gallery. Like I had 2 of the pic. List almost 900 votes that I know of because of it. Not happy right now

Too much pay to play/pay to win. Support staff has no idea what they're doing. I've seen people win competitions with the exact same subject in 3 out of 4 photos and support does nothing and denies that was the case. I've had photographs flagged as off-topic when they weren't, support does nothing then either. I imagine if I spent money I would be treated differently.

As of today, I am not able to vote in any challenges. I can still do it on the iOS app, but not the Android version. Many other people I've talked to are having the same problem. I'm voting one star right now to get your attention - will go up once it's addressed.

Simply put.... It's fun, challenging, inspiring. Getting involved will make you a better photographer. I've played with it for less than a week. And I see major improvements in most area of my photographs.

title: Picas - Art Photo Filter, Picture Filter
description:
Picas has been featured twice on Play Store as Google editor's choice! Picas is a free art photo filter & editor. It can turn every of your photo & picture into awesome artworks within 10s! With deep neural networks and artificial intelligence, Picas offers more than 100 amazing artistic filters and styles for enhancing photo & picture effects. 


"For photo art, Picas lets you quickly and easily upload an image and then apply a cool filter. "  ---Makeuseof

"Picas for Android allows you to add a touch of artistry and imagination to your photo images. Easily turn your images into mini works of art with deep neural networks and artificial intelligence. It has more than 100 unusual artistic filters and styles to enhance your photos. "  ----Majorgeeks

"This one adds to the portfolio of turn your picture into a painting. If you enjoy those, you might want to play with an extra set of filters." --PhoneArena

What makes Picas outstanding:

Be an artist and create art with AI
Picas transforms photos, pictures and selfies into famous fine art paintings with the help of artificial intelligence and deep neural network algorithm.

We‚Äôve improved the algorithm of facial recognition which will make perfect filtered portrait and selfie. It is very helpful for users who want enhance social media presence.

title: Lightning Camera - Fast Burst Camera
description:
With "Lightning Camera" everyone can easily take photos of thunderbolts, lightnings and other unpredictable scenes. This lightweight camera (<2MB) is the ultimate tool for every hobby photographer or storm hunter.
"Lightning Camera" is absolutely free of ads and charge.

Ring-Buffer burst shots make it possible
+ the app stores up to 100 images of the last ~5 seconds continuously
+ Therefore you can hit the shutter after the strike and then choose which pictures you'd like to save permanently
+ the typical camera preview frame rate is 30 pictures per seconds, which is fast enough to get good and clear images of thunderbolts
+ also great to capture images of other unpredictable scenes, like smiling children or sports action scenes

Additional Camera Options
+ you can change the size of the image buffer -> especially useful for devices with low memory specs
+ disable the continuous camera focus if it results in blurry photos on your device
+ change the exposure compensation to make your shots brighter or darker

Share your catches as photo or GIF animation
+ next to the capture button you'll get a button to a gallery to view your saved lightning shots
+ there you can select several shots (long touch) and create a GIF animation out of them
+ share your best catches either as photos or as GIF animations with your friends via any messenger app



Follow us on Instagram where I repost the best pictures you shared with me:
https://www.instagram.com/lightningcamera/

Feel free to also like my Facebook page: 
https://www.facebook.com/lightningcamera

To get featured on Instagram simply tag your shots on Instagram with #lightningcamera or post them on my Facebook page!

summary: Taking pictures of lightnings has never been so easy!
recentChanges:
uff, that was a bit more than planned :D
+ you can now switch between all available cameras
+ added setting to switch between the largest available 16:9 and 4:3 resolutions
+ all camera views react to device orientation changes
+ you can now click on the hardware volume buttons to trigger the capture button
+ a lot of crash and bug fixes
comments: Absolutely amazing app. Made capturing lightning a breeze. Works great for fireworks as well. The only other feature I would like to see is a set and forget mode. Basically, If I want to leave my phone out during a lightning storm, the app takes a quick burst everytime it sense lightning. Then say, an hour later, I can come back and check through my photos. I have missed a few strikes while looking through the previous burst to save pictures. Add that, and this app would be perfect.

This camera is awesome I live in the monsoon region in southern Arizona and I use this app everyday. The settings are a little bit tough to get used to but once you do it's automatic I like to slide the slider all the way to the right that way gives you about 4 seconds beforehand and that's perfect

I was extremely doubtful that this app would be worth jack, but to my surprise, it works. It would be perfect of it shot in RAW mode or, at least, saved photos in higher quality instead of a jepg that has super compressed.

The app works great, and I have captured some awesome pictures of lightning. Just discovered the ability to switch cameras, which now lets me use the wide-field camera on my Samsung Note 10. The one downside of this app is that it only does images in 1080p, and with very little bit depth - images are <100 KB in size, and have those color lines that low-res images have. My phone is capable of taking 60 fps in 4k and saving high-bit-depth HDR video; please let the app take advantage of that!

This app is now worthless on my Note 9 because the app sets the ISO of the main camera too high (maybe a camera update could also be a possibility), resulting in a pixelated mess. Somehow, the front facing camera does not have any issue but I won't even bother with capturing lightning using the front facing camera. For the next update, just add an ISO control option on all the cameras that the app detects on your phone.

title: SlideScan - Slide Scanner App
description:
Brought to you by the developer that built the smartest photo scanner app, Photomyne is proud to now also offer an AI-powered photo slides scanning app that will blow you away. See how those hidden memories in slides are instantly revealed, scanned and saved!


IT‚ÄôS AUTOMATIC - JUST ADD SLIDES:
1. Open a backlight source on your computer (or use the link provided in the app)

comments: Jist getting started. I didn't like using my monitor as backlighting. The new photo looked like it was taken through a screen door. Instead, I used a light that lays flat, got a small gift bag, cut an opening on the bottom, & then laid my slide on it. Perfecto!!

The images are not well focused. It could be my inability to both hold the picture perpendicular to the lighted screen and hold my phone still with the camera in focus. I tested it on the same slide I photographed with my own method which came out perfectly focused. My method: have your lighted screen laying horizontally (laptop with screen part on table). Make a simple slide platform that holds the slide about 1" from the screen and another platform to hold the phone 5" above the slide.

Easy to use and higher quality scans of my slides than any of the machines I've purchased in the past to scan slides with. I'm going through my parents slides and have over 1,000 finished. Lots more to go üòÇ. I can scan quickly too!
Easy to use. Great resolution. Better than I expected!
App works good but recurring price made me think twice.

comments: First of all, taking away being able to buy things piecemeal was hugely annoying and a bad decision. But worse than that is how, with the latest update, I can no longer use the things I purchased 4 or 5 years ago that I've been using regularly. Why would I ever upgrade if I can't even keep my original purchases??? Taking away the things I spent money on does NOT incentivize me to spend more money with you. It makes me want to go use another platform or buy from a different app altogether.

i used to love this app a lot but it recently started to glitch out and just work slow all together. i've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, even tried restarting my phone a couple of times. also what's up with making the used to be free perks cost? for example, the effects motion and smart blur all of a sudden cost. it's not really a smart move if you ask me. and i hate the ads every second. i open the app; i get an ad. i click a photo; i get an ad.

Do not download! This is a scam. They will offer you a subscription membership for free and then proceed to charge you a yearly membership for $60 US even after you cancel the free trial, even if you were to forget. They won't remind you the trial is over and proceed to charge you for a yearly subscription regardless. This is a scheme!!

Disappointed with this app. I've been using it for 7+ years and it used to be my go-to photo editing app. The addition of Gold was initially fine, but they kept pushing ads for it literally everywhere. And now, a ton of features which used to be *free* (up until literally a month ago) can now only be used if you purchase the Gold membership. Absolutely ridiculous.

You used to be able to just use this app for basic picture editing and it was a good experience all around. After just now using it after several months I've found that the app is now over run with ads for in app purchases and you can't even use the app w/o creating an account (probably so they can harvest and sell your data from it). Crazy how bad an app can be made when dishonest and greedy app developers get involved.

I think this app is worth it, it has good filters but one problem is that a lot of the filters are pro or premium. Other than that it's a great app

title: Photo Editor, Photo Frame
description:
Photo Editor, Photo Frame is a powerful photo editing and photo creation app which offers the biggest store of frames and layouts on the app market.
A powerful and intelligent photo editing set which helps you create stunning photos.

Photo Editor, Photo Frame helps you to create the perfect and wonderful photo collages. You can choose the layout or frame templates that you like best. The application let you edit your photos with color schemes, filter editing, add photo background, changing objects. More especially, it gives you an extremely lovely and cute sticker collection.

Photo Editor:
	- Professional photo editor, edit a photo from your gallery or take a new photo to edit.
	- Providing you with 100 photo filters to edit your photos
	- Interference effects, Neon, Rainbow, ect.
	- Adjust the brightness, warmth, and color tone of your photo.
	- Export images to the ratio you want: 1: 1, 4: 5, 9:16, 3: 4 with Full HD + image quality
	- Extremely cute and new set of stickers.
	- You can crop the photo or flip it in any direction you want.
	- Hand drawing tools helping you add cute brushstrokes to your photo.
	- When you are editing a photo, you can also add a frame to the photo, Photo Editor, Photo Frame brings you 700 sets of photo frames to choose.
	- You can add FX light effects to make the photo more ghostly and mysterious.

Photo frames:
	- Modern and cute frames. There are many types of frames for you to choose. You can also download online frames with many different themes such as Love, Birthday, Food, Poster, Christmas, etc.
	- Gives you 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5-photo frames, that is unique on the market!
	- Diverse filters, the application provides you more than 100 filters to edit photos.
	- There are many filters, Fx light, photo blending. You can create beautiful frames thanks to this feature of the app.
	- Simple gestures and actions to rotate, resize photos in the frame.
	- Easily change the colors and borders of the photo.
	- Change the frames easily, you can also change the pictures in the frame
	- You can experience a skin whitening and smoothing technology on Photo Editor, Photo Frame. Please download to experience this interesting feature.

Collage photos according to photo layouts:
	- Supports stitching up to 15 photos.
	- Lots of collage layout templates, lots of choices for grid photo layouts or collage layouts
	- Allows to choose a wallpaper from the device's gallery and adjust the opacity for the wallpaper
	- Border adjustment with outside, inside and corner
	- Edit, crop, rotate your photo to fit the collage frame
	- Many lovely stickers and text.
	- Editing individually each photo such as change, filter, blur, rotate, contrast, mirror, sharpness, etc.

Free style photo collage:
- With the same professional photo editing features like Photo Collage by Layout. However, with this function, you can edit photos in your own style with a photo layout making differences. Let‚Äôs be the authors of creative photos.
What are you waiting for but not download Photo Editor, Photo Frame right away to have the best photo editor today on your Android devices? We will make it easy to share your art photos on social networks.
We are working hard to give you-users a great app. Please feel free to experience and leave your review about it.
Any contributions or suggestions on Photo Editor, Photo Frame, please contact us by email:
We appreciate your support. Please download the application and enjoy.

title: Ashura Muharam Photo Frames & Muharam Sms 2019
description:
:Mu·∏•arram (Arabic: ŸÖÿ≠ÿ±ŸëŸÖ) is the first month of the Islamic calendar. The general meaning of the adjective muharram means "banned, barred, forbidden, illegal, illicit, impermissible, prohibited, unlawful, unpermitted, unauthorized or even taboo".

It is one of the four sacred months of the year during which warfare is forbidden.[1] It is held to be the second holiest month, after Rama·∏çƒÅn. Since the Islamic calendar is a lunar calendar, Muharram moves from year to year when compared with the Gregorian calendar.

The tenth day of Muharram is known as the Day of Ashura, part of the Mourning of Muharram for Shia Muslims and a day of fasting for Sunni Muslims. The practice of fasting during Ashura stems from the hadith[2] that Musa (Moses) and his people obtained a victory over the Egyptian Pharaoh on the 10th day of Muharram

title: Camera MX - Photo & Video Camera
description:
Camera MX offers every Android user an easy-to-use yet full-fledged camera app, regardless of the manufacturer of their smartphone. With over 20,000,000 installs, Camera MX is one of the most trusted free stock camera alternatives for Android. Try it today to discover why!

High-Quality
1. Support of all resolutions and ratios your camera allows
2. Fine-tuned auto focus to make sure your photos come out crystal clear
3. Customizable JPEG Quality in the camera settings
4. Auto Optimization and HDR for high-quality photos even in low light situations

Next Level Video Recording
1. Pause your video recordings at anytime and apply video cuts in realtime
2. Timelapse video recording to create epic fast motion videos
3. Apply filters and effects in realtime and even switch them while you are recording

Essential Camera Features
1. Front and back camera support
2. Flash on/off/auto + torch light to brighten the scene permanently
3. Fast camera zoom with pinch finger gestures
4. Disable the shutter sound
5. Optional GPS setting to save your current location (latitude and longitude) to the EXIF metadata

Enhanced Camera Features
1. Timer for delayed shots
2. Grid lines for better photo compositions
3. Change the exposure value to brighten/darken your photos
4. Selfie display flash to take the best possible selfies even in low light situations
5. Lock focus and exposure with a long touch

Live Photos for Android
Take moving Live Photos that can come alive when touched - with "Live Shot".
No longer decide whether to take a high-res photo or a video. With "Live Shot" you got both!

Shoot-The-Past Burst Mode
Turn your camera in a high-speed burst camera and browse sequence shots of the seconds before you pulled the trigger. 

Effect & Filter Camera
1. Hand-picked selection of beautiful camera filters
2. Kaleidoscope camera effect creates stunning photos and videos
3. Mirror camera effects for fun selfies
4. Pencil and sketch drawing effects
5. Color Splash effect that highlights a single custom color
6. Little Planet effect morphs the scene into a tiny planet

Photo & Video Editor
1. Crop your photos
2. Change brightness, contrast, saturation and color temperature for your photos and videos
3. Apply any filter and effect edits to your photos and videos afterwards as well
4. Shorten your videos with the video trimmer
5. Slow motion and fast motion video editing
6. Slow down the best part of your video and create epic slow motion highlights
7. Scale your photos and videos to reduce their file size


Have questions about Camera MX? 
Ask our 10,000 member strong Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/111611351770096008311
Or send an e-mail to: cameramx_support@magix.net
Be sure to follow us on Facebook for the latest news as well: https://www.facebook.com/cameramx

MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE PART IS INSTEAD OF MAKING PPL PAY FOR THE GOOD STUFF...They show a price but offers them for free, if u simply watch a video or write review! Thanks for an app worth using

Recently I'm unable to access photos from within the app itself. I can see them but when I tap an image, which was the way I always opened previously taken photos, the window closes and I'm back at the desktop. Getting to photos is very cumbersome now. I'm looking for a replacement to camera mx. Recent Problem: with a recent update to the android os on my Redmi 9 camera mx no longer works at all. It's DOA. Pretty sad!!!

Wonderful camera app. I have used the app since the purchase of essential ph-1. I only wish it had 360 rendering capabilities to use with ph-1 360 camera attachment. I have been more than pleased and truly appreciate the opportunity to use without any hiccups or glitches.

After latest update app crashes on startup on my LG velvet 5G. Sounds like several others having same issue. I only rated this one star in the hopes that it gets the attention of the developer. Otherwise this is a five-star app. I've been using this app for the past 6 years and it has out performed every camera / photography app I've come across. Once this bug is fixed I will edit my post to a 5-star rating. My phone is naked without it.

title: Background Eraser ‚Äì Remove Background
description:
Background eraser is the perfect app to remove background. With magic background eraser, just select the area you want to erase and erase it instantly. Background Eraser - Remove Background provides a fast and easy way to edit photo, change photos backgrounds. You can choose a beautiful background to add or leave it with a white background. We provide a lot of different options for you to edit photos, including transparent backgrounds and custom backgrounds as you like.

Background Eraser - Remove Background is an amazing application which allows the user to change photos background automatically. This application is simple and easy to use even child's can use it easily. Just touch the area you want to erase and auto eraser tool will do the rest of the work for you.

You can also erase your photos background manually by finger touch or with image cutting tool. This amazing app helps you remove/erase or replace any object from your photo background in a seamless way.
Background Eraser can remove the unwanted imagery of any picture and you can change background with any pic.

----Background Eraser - Remove Background key features----
‚òÖ Auto background eraser - One Touch Background Removal
‚òÖ Manual Erase - Finger Rub Background Removal
‚òÖ Lasso Eraser - Area Selection Background Removal
‚òÖ Undo, Redo & Zoom - For accurate result
‚òÖ Change picture background with one of pre-defined images or replace background with your own picture.
‚òÖ Easy to use with a simple interface
‚òÖ Share your photographer with friends through popular social media

Background Eraser - Remove Background is a great utility tool that you should not ignore.  It is a nifty photo editor that erases your photo background easily. We are updating to add many interesting and useful features for you to have the best experience.

Hopefully you will enjoy this amazing app. This Background Eraser - Remove Background is still in development period so your feedback is welcome. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact support email: Trustedapp.help@gmail.com. Thank you. Have a nice day ‚ù§Ô∏è
